alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Gallatin; Jefferson; Madison; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 09 at 1:23PM MDT until April 13 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations over 4 inches possible at lower elevations and over 12 inches possible in the mountains. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central, southwest, and west central Montana. * WHEN...From Monday evening through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Gallatin; Jefferson; Madison; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
